column1: Little Goat Diner////Food was very tasty
column3: and the atmosphere was aces. My boyfriend had the nachos as an entree; this I would NOT recommend
column4: they are far too rich for one person to eat alone. DELICIOUS
column5: but he felt kind of sick when it was over. I had the chickpea salad-amazing; not a healthy option really with its fritters and fried onions but I who is going there for a healthy dinner. Finally the brussel sprouts are a must have. Please
column6: do yourself a favor; so tangy
column8: my review is great vibe and rich food with excellent service. Oh I almost forgot about the turtle pie. Quite possibly the best desert I have ever had.
